title: First time bug in leauge history
body: Ok on my other acc the game was going normal then the server started lagging and my team and the enemy also verifed the lag, i got DC'd then and i couldn't reconnect. I could re que and i got into a lobby but how the fk if i am still in game, the guys are 4v5 and i cant rejoin but i can re que. Riot fix your stupied sht, those guys are 4v5 because you fked us.

replies.body: Same here man, this patch is laggin me. Ever since this 9.16 patch was updated it became laggy and freezing to me
